# App Store Connect API 1.6 release notes

**Article**

Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.

## Overview

App Store Connect API version 1.6 provides resources that enable you to automate actions you take in App Store Connect.

### New features

- The API adds [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/app-clips-and-app-clip-experiences].
- For TestFlight, a new attribute in [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/BetaGroupUpdateRequest/Data-data.dictionary/Attributes-data.dictionary] helps developers manage their iOS apps on Apple silicon Mac computers.
- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/Build/Relationships-data.dictionary/BuildBundles-data.dictionary] and [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/BuildBundle/Relationships-data.dictionary/BuildBundleFileSizes-data.dictionary] relationships provide developers more insight into their app binaries.
- The [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/apps] resource adds the ability to configure a subscription status URL for production and sandbox environments in [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/App/Attributes-data.dictionary] and [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/AppUpdateRequest/Data-data.dictionary/Attributes-data.dictionary].

## Versions

- **App Store Connect API 4.1 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 4.0 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 3.8 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.

- **App Store Connect API 3.3 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 3.2 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 3.1 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 3.0 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
- **App Store Connect API 2.4 release notes**: Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.
